title: Query Parser Data
description: This schema defines type of query parser data

tables.description: List of tables used in query

databaseName.description: Database associated with the table in the query

joins.description: Maps each parsed table name of a query to the join information

serviceName.description: Name that identifies this database service.

userName.description: Name of the user that executed the SQL query

date.description: Date of execution of SQL query

databaseSchema.description: Database schema of the associated with query

duration.description: How long did the query took to run in seconds.
